sentence.Network_en: Unless I'm mistaken, he didn't specify what time.
sentence.Network_cn: 除非我记错了，他并没有说明具体时间。

sentence.Network_en: Remember to specify your size when ordering clothes.
sentence.Network_cn: 订购服装时记着要详细说明你要的号码。

sentence.Network_en: We should specify a time and a place for the meeting.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们应指定会议的时间和地点.

means.word_mean: 列举,引用,指出,分析,选择,决定
确定,使明确,描述,表现,说明,区别,加标记,命名

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French specifier or late Latin specificare (see specific)

entry.def: If you specify something, you give information about what is required or should happen in a certain situation.

example.ex: They specified a spacious entrance hall...
example.tran: 他们专门指定要一个宽敞的大门厅。

example.ex: He has not specified what action he would like them to take.
example.tran: 他尚未明确说明自己希望他们采取什么样的行动。

entry.def: If you specify what should happen or be done, you explain it in an exact and detailed way.

example.ex: Each recipe specifies the size of egg to be used...
example.tran: 每种菜谱都具体规定了所用鸡蛋的大小。

example.ex: One rule specifies that learner drivers must be supervised by adults...
example.tran: 一条规则明确规定，见习驾驶员必须有成人的监督。

means.word_mean: 1. specify as a condition or requirement in a contract or agreement; make an express demand or provision in an agreement;

sentences.sentence: "The will stipulates that she can live in the house for the rest of her life"
"The contract stipulates the dates of the payments"
"Could you please specify your criticism of my paper?"
"I cannot narrow down the rules for this game"
"She was intended to become the director"

means.word_mean: 7. select something or someone for a specific purpose;

sentences.sentence: "The teacher assigned him to lead his classmates in the exercise"

auth_sentence.content: The company didn't specify the cause of death.
auth_sentence.res_content: The company didn't specify the cause of death.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The company didn't specify the cause of death.

auth_sentence.content: He did not specify how that would be done.
auth_sentence.res_content: He did not specify how that would be done.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He did not specify how that would be done.

auth_sentence.content: He did not specify a location for such talks.
auth_sentence.res_content: He did not specify a location for such talks.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He did not specify a location for such talks.

stems_affixes.word_buile: con共同+specific特有的→共同特有的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的
stems_affixes.word_buile: speci外观,种类,特别+al……的→adj.特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 明确的,具体的;特定的,特有的
stems_affixes.word_buile: speci外观,种类,特别+fic→具体的,特有的
e+special[adj.特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的]→adj.特别的, 特殊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 似是而非的,华而不实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: speci外观,种类,特别+ous……的→外观相似而实质不同
especial[adj.特别的, 特殊的]+ly表副词→adv.特别, 尤其
special特殊的,专门的+ist专家或人→n.专门医师, 专家
special[adj.特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的]+ity表名词→n.[specialty]特性,性质;专业/长;特产
speci外观,种类,特别+es表复数→[所有]种类
specific[adj.明确的,具体的;特定的,特有的]+ation表名词→n.详述;[常n.]规格,说明书,规范
speci外观,种类,特别+men表物品→n.标本,样本
special[adj.特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的]+ize化→v.[specialise][in]专攻,专门研究,专业化

stems_affixes.value_cn: 指定, 详细说明, 列入清单
stems_affixes.word_buile: speci外观,种类,特别+ify表动词→specify规类→指定, 列入清单

Sentence.sentence: We're asking the customers to specify what they want," said Craig Prusher, the chain's vice president of government relations.

sentences.en: Please specify what you will do.
sentences.cn: 请你详述一下你将做什么。

sentences.en: We should specify a time and a place for the meeting.
sentences.cn: 我们应指定会议的时间和地点。

means.word_mean: 具体说明；把…写入说明书；详细列举

sentences.en: The details were specified on Page 35.
sentences.cn: 具体方法详见(说明书)第35页。

means.word_mean: 提出…的条件，把…作为条件

sentences.en: She specified that she be given her son.
sentences.cn: 她提出把儿子交给她抚养作为条件。

jushi.english: We should specify a time and a place for the meeting.
jushi.chinese: 我们应指明会议的时间和地点。

jushi.english: She specified three types of mistake which had occurred.
jushi.chinese: 她指出了已出现的三种错误。

jushi.english: The contract specifies steel sashes for the windows.
